Property.name: formId
Property.comment: (optional) The id of the FORM tag (defaults to an auto-generated id).

Property.name: itemCls
Property.comment: A css class to apply to the x-form-item of fields. This property cascades to child containers.

Property.name: labelAlign
Property.comment: Valid values are 'left,' 'top' and 'right' (defaults to 'left'). This property cascades to child containers and can be overridden on any child container (e.g., a fieldset can specify a different labelAlign for its fields).

Property.name: labelWidth
Property.comment: The width of labels. This property cascades to child containers and can be overridden on any child container (e.g., a fieldset can specify a different labelWidth for its fields).

Property.name: minButtonWidth
Property.comment: Minimum width of all buttons in pixels (defaults to 75)

Property.name: monitorPoll
Property.comment: The milliseconds to poll valid state, ignored if monitorValid is not true (defaults to 200)

Property.name: monitorValid
Property.comment: If true the form monitors its valid state.

Event.name: clientvalidation
Event.comment: If the monitorValid config option is true, this event fires repetitively to notify of valid state

Param.name: valid
Param.comment: true if the form has passed client-side validation
